name: Pre-Release Checklist
description: Manual trigger to run through pre-release checklist before publishing

action.message:
Running pre-release checklist for AITrader extension:

**Testing:**
- [ ] All unit tests pass
- [ ] All property tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing with real Gemini API completed
- [ ] Tested with multiple chart types
- [ ] Error handling verified

**Security:**
- [ ] API key storage is secure
- [ ] No sensitive data in logs
- [ ] Permissions are minimal

**Documentation:**
- [ ] README.md is up to date
- [ ] Version number updated in manifest.json
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated

**Chrome Web Store:**
- [ ] Screenshots prepared
- [ ] Privacy policy reviewed
- [ ] Store listing description ready

Please verify each item and report any issues.
